title: BIT-BENDER
author: BIT-BENDER
content: I greet everyone I know many of us wey dey here suppose don get better understanding about crypto-currency and even how to trade on binance but I still believe that this forum is growing and there are still many newbies coming in. so to go straight to the point my friend who is a bit new to crypto-currency was telling me about here experience sell her Bitcoin a popular exchange she has already understood some of the basic on how to sell but this Time while selling the buyer asked for here number which she gave and then chatted her demanding that they trade outside the exchange, and even offered a higher deal than the exchange. this is a big red flag because you a vulnerable to getting scammed if you are trading with someone you don't know off the exchange no matter how juicy the offer is.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Why will an experience trader that has been trading p2p before now agree to do a p2p trade out the exchanger she has been using to make successful trades. Never should you agree to trade p2p outside with anybody you don't know despite how much higher the price they will be offering.Scammers are fond of using promises that are too good to be true is luring gullible newbies, never get greedy always use recommended and reputable channels for p2p. If anyone chat you on binance to trade outside binance never agree to it, you will be scammed if you do and you won't have who to report to.

This na one of the reason wey make Oyibo create exchange, them make exchange so that we fit dey swap or exchange coin for fiat. So I no see reason wey go make person say make we trade outside the exchange wey be say, if I no confirm payment I no go fit release my coin give any buyer. Some persons sef dey do this kind of outside trade well well for this country, and some of their rates too dey good to be true, na why I no dey trust any vendor for this we country. I don hear of case sef wey person say the vendor show am sent transaction say make em credit am, and case like this the vendor go dey rush the seller or buyer to credit dem or release coin asap. But if you wise you go wait for confirmation before you release coin or send fundz, so if we dey do any kind of trade make we dey very patient until we receive result, not from the vendor but from our wallet or bank account.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: People need not to be carried away just because of little offer deal that trader would want to do off the exchange. I know the exchange is not very pure and free from scam but it is better to trade p2p not to lose your money than to trade with a total stranger that is off the exchange.  Losing money all in the name of trading is very painful, I think people just neeed to do right thing and not to allow just increase of rate of trade to be used as a strategy to get into the hands of scammers. When it comes to trading people needs to be extremely careful because their are lots of scammers looking for who to scam.

Another red flag way to know is they will then say you should send first before their payment. They may even say they are victim of p2p scam just to give you a false assurance that they are not scammers, but don't fall them. In fact do not be the first sender before receiving since you are sure that you will definitely pay once you receive the bitcoin or money and not otherwise because no body is to be trusted online.

So this your topic make sense well well because e dey easy to scam the newbies than people wey don dey long for the business. There is a reason the exchanges design their p2p platform the way it is and as you can see, the funds are in escrow meaning any funny move can be tackled. But outside the exchange, it becomes very difficult. So never accept trade outside the exchange.

comments.body: I don't think if anyone would want to loose in any business, so I can say I clearly understood something obviously fishy about his pledge to displease himself an exchange trader and I the crytop traders at the point he could offer to pay a higher rate of the exchange value and the  why he must need my private detail (phone number) as we were strictly supposed to only do the  business and apart from that, why we must trade off the applicable platform is a very large one of the suspicious ness of him being negative.The tendencies of easily falling for scammers is mostly when one implies greeds in the trading firms and also the acts of reconciling your doubtful ness to considering the scammers emotions and lastly, your passiveness towards strange sensitivities.

We get local vendors wey we fit trade with and they're as good as those centralized platforms wey we dey patronized. The main thing be say as you dey deal with any P2P trade on a platform wey no get escrow you need dey careful make you no go dey trade with scammers as dem plenty online.If you no wan use CEX like Binance exchange dem you fit ask around and get better merchant wey dey run the buying and selling for your area but you go need dey security careful make you no go dey present yourself to them as been too rich before them set you up. Always learn to dey trade in batches and e no go bad to disguise yourself as also a merchant trading others coin so e no go belike all the money wey you dey trade na your own. Another thing na to dey avoid high rate, whether na for Binance exchange oh or for local vendors, high rate na trick wey scammers dey use to attract greedy people so you need dey lower your longer throat den to dey regret later say your money dun loss due to scam. E better you buy or sell at a moderate rate and be guaranteed your trade been successful then to go dey chase high rate.

comments.author: Btcdeybodi
comments.body: Op our problem in this country is claiming to know everything when we don't even know anything, sometimes you will be teaching some persons on how to about online trading and let's assume that you're taking it step by step in teaching the person you won't even get to the final sarge they will claim they know how to go about it, moreover no matter how you feel you've understand what is being taught there is still need to sort help next time when you want to do it to be fully sure that you know what you're doing.Another problem we have in this country is that most people are easily deceived whenever it comes to giving out little and getting more than what you gave out. Whenever people hear someone talking about investing money and getting double of what you invested their ears will go high without thinking about where the person that promises to double your money will get it from or even if it's his money doesn't they have anything to do with money rather giving it out because they want to double money that you've invested. Inasmuch as money is concerned, no body wants to lose money or give out money to people that didn't perform any work for them so it's obvious that when you encounter such people you should understand that they are fraudulent and scammers.Furthermore, sometimes I don't blame people because poverty has really eaten deep in some persons life such that they don't care about their privacy or about if what they're getting their self in is fraudulent they will just get involved with the hope of making profits. So poverty is a major criteria that has caused some people falling so easily to internet scams

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: This story never complete OP, She gree to deal outside the exchange abi wetin later happen? Most of traders nowadays na through scam dem dey take make money and dem go dey form. Dem plenty for WhatsApp and telegram now. Experience people no go likely fall for dem cheap scam method. If you must trade outside exchanges, never send first no matter the sweet mouth of the vendor. But as a newbie, e better make you runaway from trading outside exchange because you fit no withstand the pressure and you go throwaway your coins. Even for inside exchanges, make sure you confirm your payment and everything is intact before you release your coins because some P2P vendors dey send incomplete payment deliberately sometimes.
